review: I would have given this 5 stars if I would have received better customer service. A week after receiving this the remote stopped working. Amazon customer service was very difficult in providing a replacement. Aside from my concerns on their warrantee policies, I have been very happy with it. the set up was very easy and everyday use is simple.
